description: Numbers n such that continued fraction for sqrt(n) has period 4.
references: Kenneth H. Rosen, Elementary Number Theory and Its Applications, Addison-Wesley, 1984, page 426 (but beware of errors!).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: cfp4Q[n_]:=Module[{sr=Sqrt[n]},!IntegerQ[sr]&&Length[ ContinuedFraction[ sr][[2]]]==4]; Select[Range[500],cfp4Q] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 29 2014 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
